Articles.Content:
I've noticed I've often had issues with small landing gear getting stuck and either being unable to retract, or unable to deploy (they get "stuck", and I can't change their state)

Right now, in game, its also happening with my large landing gear... anyone else have this bug, and no how to fix it?
The only time that ever happens to me is when I've transferred or EVA'd everybody out of the command pods.
